product_name: NUUN Energy Drink Mix - Multiple Servings
long_description: NUUN Energy Drink Mix tablets contain an optimal blend of electrolytes, B vitamins and caffeine to maximize hydration and mental focus for all of your high-energy adventures. Just drop 1 tablet into 16 oz. of water, wait 2 minutes and drink. Convenient 4 in. tall plastic tube contains 10 tablets. NUUN Energy Drink Mix doesn't contain sugar or carbohydrates, so there's no need to worry about the extra calories usually found in sport drinks. 5 B vitamins and 40 milligrams of caffeine per tablet. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: NUUN Energy Drink Mix tablets contain an optimal blend of electrolytes, B vitamins and caffeine to maximize hydration and mental focus for all of your high-energy adventures.
